DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability E5555 Japanese patient acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-Blind Study E5555 Japanese Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: 1 . 45 80 year old ( time inform consent ) 2 . Male female ( female childbearing potential must contracepted ) 3 . Confirmed acute coronary syndrome 1 . Unwilling unable provide inform consent 2 . History acquire congenital bleeding disorder , coagulopathy , platelet disorder 3 . Recent trauma major surgery 4 . Evidence active pathological bleeding screen history gastrointestinal genitourinary bleed unknown cause within 24 week prior screen 5 . History intracranial bleed history hemorrhagic retinopathy 6 . History New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV congestive heart failure 7 . Pregnant lactating woman
